ygData.msgSnippet: There was a wrong ratio of water and gnomis spirits.  I would lean toward Water, 2 Gnomish Spirits, bat wings, metal shaft. that has not been tested. If that

Water, 2 Gnomish Spirits, bat wings, metal shaft.

that has not been tested.
